title: Dog Whistle Detection
description: Detects the use of coded language or 'dog whistles'—specific words or phrases that signal allegiance to certain groups or agendas without overtly stating them.
indicators: Patterns of specific names, phrases, or terms repeatedly used in contexts that align with certain ideologies or groups
Language that appears neutral on the surface but is known to carry a coded meaning for specific audiences
Use of dog whistles to reshape or influence narratives while bypassing explicit statements
